name: Colour Shooter
description:
Hiya! 

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam, week 112, which had the theme of "Color the World" (https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-112). I may, or may not, have taken the theme a tad too literally, but hey, I think it's kinda fun, heh. 

This was my first Game Jam, so any and all criticism is welcome, as I'm trying to learn as much as possible from each project. I understand the game is a tad feature-lacking, but I would still appreciate it if you took the time to try it out and leave some comments on how it plays out!

Credits: Tree and Mountain models were taken from Kenney's Nature Kit - asset pack. https://www.kenney.nl/assets/nature-kit

Controls:

W A S D - movement

Mouse - rotation of character and aim

Mouse 1 - Shoot
